data.title: Classic TV on DVD- The Lists: Animated Series, Children's shows
data.meta_description: The following is a list of all animated programs as well as non-animated children's shows from the 1930's (theatrical shorts) up to the 1990's, that have...
data.text:
The following is a list of all animated programs as well as non-animated children's shows from the 1930's (theatrical shorts) up to the 1990's, that have been released on DVD in Region 1. The list is organized by studio, major production companies followed by the smaller, independent studios. Here is the first part of the list, the major studios:

COLUMBIA PICTURES

(UPA)

The Dick Tracy Show (All 130 cartoons, Classic Media)

Jolly Frolics (All 38 theatrical cartoons, TCM Vault Collection)

Mr. Magoo (1950) (All 53 theatrical cartoons, Shout! Factory)

The Mr. Magoo Show (1960) (All 131 cartoons, Classic Media** / Shout! Factory)

The Famous Adventures of Mr. Magoo (1964) (All 26 episodes, Shout! Factory)

The Adventures of Aquaman (All 36 cartoons, Warner Bros.)

The Adventures of Batman (All 34 cartoons, Warner Bros.)
